TopicTitle: Show us your Asteroid Space Station

Articles.Content:
Why just do science when you can settle in?

Rules are simple. It's an Asteroid. It's a Space Station. You have Pics... post them here!

Here is mine. I have the command module in place. There are some other docking ports clawed in around it. Will be sending some fuel tanks next.
Not exactly a space station, but an asteroid nevertheless. I'm pretty proud of my redirecting skills.

There is a thread like this in the spacecraft exchange, but...

Styx Outpost. The only asteroid I've captured thus far, not due to incompetency, but owing to the lack of asteroids passing by while I'm not busy, and the multitude of them when I am busy

3 crew, nice and cosy on their class B asteroid (named Styx). I'm awaiting a bigger asteroid to show up to make a better looking asteroid base, but until then, I have a grand tour to get on with and a refuelling station to rebuild...

There is a thread like this in the spacecraft exchange

I was not aware of that. Doesn't seem the right place since they are not exchangeable.

Anyhows - what's the green boxes about? What mod?

I was not aware of that. Doesn't seem the right place since they are not exchangeable.

Anyhows - what's the green boxes about? What mod?

Greenhouse module from LLL.

Also, it's probably worth mentioning that the Kraken launched an assault on the outpost and destroyed the link between the claw and the base. They're just drifting now, waiting for rescue. I'll probably send another base to the asteroid soon...
